title: Resolve In-Game Guild Dispute
description: The leader of a guild (a player group) reports that a disruptive member is stealing from the shared guild bank.

tasks.description: Retrieve the guild bank transaction logs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a log of all item withdrawals from the guild bank.

tasks.description: Analyze the logs to identify the disruptive member and the items they took without permission.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms one member withdrew a large number of valuable items.

tasks.description: Issue a temporary ban to the disruptive member and return the stolen items to the guild bank.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent bans the player and restores the stolen items.
